lore: Wraithguard are all but impervious to pain. This is vitally important, for their D-scythes and wraithcannons are short-ranged, and require them to advance close to the foe. These immensely powerful weapons fire arcane beams that open a momentary rift between realspace and the warp, capable of tearing any target apart.

faction: War Construct: Once per battle round
when an enemy unit targets this unit
after that unit has finished making its attacks
this unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase.
